title: How much internet data per day is sufficient for you? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s totally depends on usage. Initially I use jio 1.5 gb plan and it was sufficient for me. After I switched to idea which give me 4 gb/day and I thought this will be more than enough. But, I was wrong when I started using amazon prime video a movie consumes anywhere between 1.5 to 2 gb on HD quality. Just after watching 2 movies my data plan get exhausted. so it depends for what you are using for either for meetings app like zoom or google meet, basic streaming and downloading songs or streaming movies.

Sir, it's totally depends on your internet usage.If you want to stream videos on YouTube than you will need more data and also high speed.If you are using torrent then you need alot.(unlimited)And if you just use WhatsApp, fb messenger,simple internet browsing than approx 500 MB is sufficient.I hope this will help you!!
